sn48.38:2.2: Yam kho, bhikkhave, kayikam sukham, kayikam satam, kayasamphassajam sukham satam vedayitam—
sn48.38:3.2: Yam kho, bhikkhave, kayikam dukkham, kayikam asatam, kayasamphassajam dukkham asatam vedayitam—
sn48.38:4.2: Yam kho, bhikkhave, cetasikam sukham, cetasikam satam, manosamphassajam sukham satam vedayitam—
sn48.38:5.2: Yam kho, bhikkhave, cetasikam dukkham, cetasikam asatam, manosamphassajam dukkham asatam vedayitam—
sn48.38:6.2: Yam kho, bhikkhave, kayikam va cetasikam va neva satam nasatam vedayitam—
sn48.38:7.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yanca sukhindriyam yanca somanassindriyam, sukha sa vedana datthabba.
sn48.38:7.2: Tatra, bhikkhave, yanca dukkhindriyam yanca domanassindriyam, dukkha sa vedana datthabba.
sn48.38:7.3: Tatra, bhikkhave, yadidam upekkhindriyam, adukkhamasukha sa vedana datthabba.
sn48.38:7.4: Iti kho, bhikkhave, imani pancindriyani panca hutva tini honti, tini hutva panca honti pariyayena”ti.
